af89ad55-4c22-47fb-94dd-576cf578f17f.description: The earner of this badge distinguishes for his/her Digital Transformation efforts across Latinamerica, being a change advocate in the sector. He/she is part of the Digital Community that drives the business into being more digital and agile. The We digital Latam Ambassador influence the teams to embrace digital transformation and coach on We Digital topics to move PepsiCo forward in the Digital Transformation.
af89ad55-4c22-47fb-94dd-576cf578f17f.name: We Digital Latam Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Answered the We Digital Assessment to get to know their strenghts & challenges in each of the elements of the We Digital Framework.

Has completed at least 80% of the Degreed Pathway as pre-work for the live sessions. It includes an introduction to Digital Transformation, PepsiCo's global Digital Transformation Strategy, an introduction to Cloud Computing & Blockchain, and a case study.
Attend the We Digital Live Webinar, in which the assessment was reviewed and an introduction to Data Refinement was made.

Participated in the two-day We Digital Training, attending a total of 4 lectures and resolving a case study. The sessions included: 1. The Moment is Now 2. Leadership Mindset & WOWs 3. Understand the Digital Business Context 4. Increase your Technical Savvy.

9408b783-8721-4b1b-a1bf-bc46b7392fd2.description: The RPA Business Analyst training teaches business analysts how to analyze business processes and introduce RPA into your organization. This trail provides an understanding of dependencies and considerations to build out a valid case for automation. You will learn about the RPA Business Analyst role and responsibilities and how you can support RPA implementation. The RPA Business Analyst training also covers the skills and challenges you may face in a BA position.
9408b783-8721-4b1b-a1bf-bc46b7392fd2.name: RPA Business Analyst Certification

badge_template_activities.title: RPA Awareness, Enterprise RPA Journey, COE, BA role during the lifecycle of an RPA project, Opportunity assessment and Practical Exercise (I)
Process deep dive, Build, UAT, Go-Live Preparation, Constant improvement, Business case, Key factors, Lessons learnt, Practical Exercise (II)

skills.name: Experience that encompasses business and consulting roles to determine if a RPA is the right solution
Expertise in lean business process improvement

23d2486b-f2e5-472d-8fe6-7367ac0e4348.description: PepsiCo’s Accelerated Leadership Program (ALP I) is part of the Global Leadership Curriculum and aims at accelerating the leadership development through exposure to key concepts, skills and behaviors that are required for future success within PepsiCo. ALP is designed to support participants in understanding the critical role they play in the organization to lead at the next level and the implications this has for career, leadership mindset and behaviors.
23d2486b-f2e5-472d-8fe6-7367ac0e4348.name: ALP-I LatAm 2022
